original_text: And he said unto them the third time, Why, what evil hath he done? I have found no cause of death in him: I will therefore chastise him, and let him go.
korean_text: 빌라도가 세 번째 말하되 이 사람이 무슨 악한 일을 하였느냐 나는 그에게서 죽일 죄를 찾지 못하였나니 때려서 놓으리라 하니

sentences.original_text: And he said unto them the third time
Why, what evil hath he done?
I have found no cause of death in him
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그에게서 죽을 죄를 찾지 못했다
